author: Courtney Connley
title: 'Every day has been so different': How executives at Facebook, Twitter and more are working from home
description: CNBC Make It spoke to female executives at Twitter, Facebook, Airbnb and Uber to get insight on how they're managing their work-from-home schedules in the midst of a global pandemic.
content:
Before March 11, when Twitter employees were mandated to work from home, executive Dalana Brand would wake up at 5 a.m. to shower, get dressed and head to the company's office in San Francisco.  
As vice president of people experience and head of diversity a… [+7700 chars]
